mapper.select: select r.req_ix, r.emp_ix, e.e_name, e.e_birthday, e.e_tel, e.e_email from req_tb r, emp_tb e where r.man_ix = #{man_ix} and r.emp_ix = e.emp_ix

select r.req_ix, e.e_group, r.emp_ix, e.e_name, e.e_position, e.e_tel, e.e_email, e.authorization, e.e_birthday, r.regit_day from req_tb r, emp_tb e where r.man_ix = #{man_ix} and r.emp_ix = e.emp_ix and r.regit_day > to_date('19000101', 'YYYYMMDD')
select 1 from group_tb where man_ix = #{man_ix} and e_group = #{e_group}
select 1 from position_tb where man_ix = #{man_ix} and e_position = #{e_position}
select max(priority) from position_tb where man_ix = #{man_ix}
select e_position from position_tb where man_ix = #{man_ix} order by priority
